text: #Gemini would rather keep shit to themselves, than to ask advice from people who cannot relate.

text: #Gemini think showing feelings = vulnerability & getting hurt, which is why they never reveal to much emotions at once.
author: GeminiTBH

text: Biggest turn off to #Gemini; Unappreciative people. If you can't appreciate the small things they do, you won't get shit from them.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini are clever & manipulative as hell. You may never know what they're up to. They usually get away with A LOT of shit.
author: GeminiTBH

text: Its not easy to know how a #Gemini feels for you, but trust that when the time comes they'll always treat you right & be there for you.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini will not do long term things for short-term people. If you aren't trustworthy or loyal, you won't get shit from them.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini can spot a fake person a mile away.
author: GeminiTBH

text: You can never see when #Gemini is going through a down-fall. They always look like they're at their best, even when they are not.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini are very rare, they keep to their words. If they say they're going to do it, it will get done.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini have the mentality of an adult, but they will always be a child at heart.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini may seem cool & harmless, but don't push them. They can be very harmful when stepped to.
author: GeminiTBH

text: While everyone walks one-way, #Gemini will walk the other. They don't follow, what-so-ever.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini are over protective of whats theirs. Don't cross a #Gemini or fuck with their shit.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini will decide on how they'll treat you mainly based on how you treat them first.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini aren't afraid to compete with you. But, trying to make them jealous, will only backfire in the end.
author: GeminiTBH

text: Just cause #Gemini doesn't talk about it, doesn't mean they don't know & when the time comes #Gemini will have them facts for your ass.
author: GeminiTBH

text: No matter what, #Gemini will remain Loyal. If they want to leave, You'll know.
author: GeminiTBH

text: The #Gemini charm & friendly attitude can lead to problems in relationships. Sorry, we can't help it.
author: GeminiTBH

text: #Gemini can hurt you just as well as they can love you.
